Rhapsody.sharedMems

Class GeneralRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rhapsody.sharedMems.GeneralRepository

  • public class GeneralRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    General repository of information for the rhapsody

    Here lies the data that is general to all and will be logged, like flightId, luggage on plane, passenger type and the real age fo the earth according to the holy bible.
